description:
A hackathon for data scientists and data enthusiasts. During one day we want you to play with the city’s data and come up with solutions that will trigger the improvement of the quality of life in the city. Follow the link to register! 
AGENDA
7:50 Check-in & Coffee
8:30 Opening Session
9:00 Hackathon Starts
12:00 Lunch
18:30 Pitch
19:45 Jury deliberation / Networking
20:15 Winners Announcement
20:30 That’s all Folks. For now…
name: Hackacity Porto
